casebody.data:
Yolanda Gianfranciso v. A and P Tea Company (13275)

Lavery, Heiman and Spear, Js.

Submitted on briefs November 3 decision released November 22, 1994 Victor M. Ferrante and Edward L. Cleary filed a brief for the appellant (plaintiff). James T. Baldwin filed a brief for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

The decision of the workers’ compensation review board is affirmed.
